WorkItem.ClosedComment: This has been resolved in the most recent build. (32467)
WorkItem.Description: Flametongue totem is being listed as a 144 spell power buff, but if specced 3/3 into Enhancing Totems, it gives 166 spell power (144+21.6). It would be appreciated if this could be added underneath it -- much like all of the "Improved" talents are added.
